summary: The diff implements a substantial rebuild of the Rweb Infotech frontend and backend. Most REQ-31, REQ-32, and REQ-33 requirements appear addressed, but there are notable gaps around generated static image files, the logo rendering in the header (uses a Lucide icon instead of the generated PNG), and specific named image files required by the spec.

missing_requirements.requirement: Rweb Infotech logo image (rweb-logo.dim_200x60.png) must be present under frontend/public/assets/generated and rendered in the site header.
missing_requirements.reason: The SiteHeader.tsx uses a Lucide Laptop icon and text wordmark instead of the generated logo PNG (rweb-logo.dim_200x60.png). No evidence the file exists or is referenced in the header.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero/banner image (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png) must be present and rendered on the Home page.
missing_requirements.reason: No HomePage file appears in the diff, and no reference to hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png is visible in any modified file. The hero section CSS class hero-gradient is defined but uses a CSS gradient, not the required static image.

missing_requirements.requirement: Brand placeholder images (brand-apple.dim_300x200.png, brand-dell.dim_300x200.png, brand-hp.dim_300x200.png, brand-asus.dim_300x200.png) must be present and shown for brands without real logos.
missing_requirements.reason: The placeholders.ts references a single brand-placeholder.dim_256x256.png rather than the four specifically named brand tiles at 300x200. There is no evidence the required named brand images exist or are referenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Laptop product placeholder image (laptop-placeholder.dim_600x400.png) must be present and used in product cards and detail pages.
missing_requirements.reason: The placeholders.ts defines paths to laptop-generic-1/2/3.dim_1200x900.png but the spec requires laptop-placeholder.dim_600x400.png. The required filename and dimensions are not referenced anywhere in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Chat avatar image (chat-avatar.dim_128x128.png) must be present and used in the Chat page.
missing_requirements.reason: ChatPage.tsx references /assets/generated/ai-girl-avatar.dim_512x512.png rather than the required chat-avatar.dim_128x128.png filename and dimensions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Home page loads with hero section, call-to-action buttons, and features section.
missing_requirements.reason: No HomePage.tsx file is present in the diff (neither added nor modified), so it is impossible to confirm the Home page meets acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: Products page displays all laptop models in a searchable and filterable grid.
missing_requirements.reason: ProductsPage.tsx is listed as a modified file but its content was omitted due to truncation limits. It cannot be confirmed that it correctly implements the searchable and filterable grid per spec.

missing_requirements.requirement: Laptop Detail page shows image gallery, variant selector, and full specifications.
missing_requirements.reason: LaptopDetailPage.tsx is listed as a modified file but its content was omitted due to truncation. Cannot confirm it is fully implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: CatalogPage (/catalog route) added as a separate page distinct from ProductsPage (/products).
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only mentions a Products page. A separate Catalog page and /catalog route appear in App.tsx and CatalogPage.tsx without being requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media links (Facebook, X/Twitter, Instagram, YouTube) added to the site footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request and acceptance criteria make no mention of social media links in the footer; these were added without being requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Top announcement bar in site header showing Trusted Laptop Dealer in India and a phone number.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies the header should show logo, search bar, and navigation links. The top announcement bar is an addition not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Three laptop gallery fallback images (laptop-generic-1/2/3.dim_1200x900.png) instead of the single specified laptop-placeholder.dim_600x400.png.
hallucinated_features.reason: The spec requests one specific laptop placeholder image at 600x400. The implementation uses three differently-named images at 1200x900.
